name: atvusb-creator
tagline: Create an AppleTV patchstick from a USB thumb drive.
body:
### atvusb-creator
This program creates a patchstick from a USB thumb drive for the Apple TV 1 (1st Generation).
This will **NOT** work on the newer generation (Black) Apple TV's.

### About
This project was forked from https://github.com/davilla/atvusb-creator

### FAQ
**Q:** `An error occurred creating your patchstick. For more details visit: https://dna64.github.io/atvusb-creator/`  

**A:** If you get this `error message` when trying to build a patchstick it's because it the program was unable to fetch a required file. This could be because you don't have an internet location, or because the file no longer exists, has moved, or been renamed.

### TODO
* Update to support latest firmware (3.0.2)
* Add checks for pre-existing local files
* Add redundancy for links and improve communication between program and user 

### COMPLETED
* Fix dead/broken links to dependencies
* Create new error message for `FailBuildPatchstick`

### Support or Contact
Having troubles? Get in touch with me on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/DNA64) and Iâ€™ll try and help you sort them out.
